sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-container>
    <!-- 其实就是超链接 -->
    <b-breadcrumb>
      <b-breadcrumb-item href="#Home">Home</b-breadcrumb-item>
      <b-breadcrumb-item href="#Blog">Blog</b-breadcrumb-item>
      <b-breadcrumb-item active>Hello world!</b-breadcrumb-item>
    </b-breadcrumb>
    <hr />
    <!-- 如果要读入数组，这样子写 -->
    <b-breadcrumb :items="bcItems"></b-breadcrumb>
  </b-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      bcItems: [{
        text: 'Home',
        href: "#Home",
      }, {
        text: 'Blog',
        href: "#Blog",
      }, {
        text: 'Hello world',
        active: true,
      }]
    }
  },
  methods: {

  }
}
</script>
